title: Riot could you please implement 'previous summoner name' into your chat.
body: I have all these randoms on my friendslist because they keep changing their names. I want to hover over their name and it tells me their name before they changed that. OP.gg does it but its annoying searching up everyone...

replies.body:
Hey DancingStranger,

I had the same problem while back. I think about a year ago we introduced a feature in the friend list that allows you to add notes exactly for this reason.
Have a look how I will always know that ToxicHawk is Daniel Gordon even when I'll rename his account "I love puppies" :)
'i love puppies' - That's a new low, even for Dan... Can you make him change his name to Riot Happy Pigeon, He fed and raged less when he was this. Thank senpai Mirkinen.

Hahah.

You may change by name but always remember MasterMirkinen I can always change yours too.

But i kind of like the idea that is being described here my only thought is perhaps it could be auto generated or something into the notes section like Mirkinen has shown, as it might be too much info for a hover over to show and become messy.
Omg, your name is similar to my name :O Btw, that is a great idea, oce.op.gg has it, but I ceebs checking anymore XD
